Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.tables

Class NGXDataTable

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.Element
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.tables.Table
com.dougnoel.sentinel.elements.tables.NGXDataTable
public class NGXDataTable
extends Table
Implements an ngx-datatable WebElement. Contains functionality for counting values, finding values inside a table, and other management issues, such as finding a value in the same row.
